title: Worlds missions
body: So I completed the first set of missions, including the pass ones but it has been over a week and I have not received any new missions. Is this a bug or just how it's gonna be?

replies.body: I feel the next mission might not come up till Thursday since that's when Worlds started last week.

Worlds missions will be coming out around the same time each week. We haven't quite made it around to a full week since the first day that they launched, but we should be seeing them pop up in a day or two.
New missions for the Worlds Event will be released in a week or so. Just wait until then.
Same I haven't gotten any new missions for worlds either. I also have the pass and on the complete 4 missions with 3/4 done.
I'm on the one where its says complete 4 missions but that's the only one and I'm at 3/4
